sentences.en: He was known for risky tactics that ranged from audacious to outrageous.
sentences.cn: 他以大胆甚至是骇人听闻的冒险战术而闻名。

sentences.en: It's the latest turn in the unwinding of one of the most audacious promises of the 20th century.
sentences.cn: 这是20世纪最大胆的承诺之一的最新转折。

sentences.en: You been into some other audacious mischief when I wasn't around, like enough.
sentences.cn: 我不在的时候，你说不定又干了些别的胆大妄为的淘气事。
